named-query.name: TAG_DICTIONARY_BY_GUID

named-query.name: TAG_DICTIONARY_ALL
named-query.query: SELECT t FROM TagDictionaryImpl AS t

named-query.name: TAG_GROUP_ALL
named-query.query: SELECT t FROM TagGroupImpl AS t

named-query.name: TAG_DEFINITION_BY_GUID
named-query.query: SELECT t FROM TagDefinitionImpl AS t WHERE t.guid = ?1

named-query.name: TAG_DEFINITION_BY_NAME
named-query.query: SELECT t FROM TagDefinitionImpl AS t WHERE t.name = ?1

named-query.name: TAG_DEFINITIONS_BY_GROUP_UIDPK
named-query.query: SELECT t FROM TagDefinitionImpl AS t WHERE t.group.uidPk = ?1 ORDER BY t.name ASC

named-query.name: TAG_DEFINITION_ALL
named-query.query: SELECT t FROM TagDefinitionImpl AS t

named-query.name: TAG_DEFINITION_ALL_BY_TAG_DICTIONARY_GUID
named-query.query: SELECT t FROM TagDefinitionImpl AS t WHERE t.tagDictionaryGuid = ?1

named-query.name: CONDITION_BY_GUID
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM ConditionalExpressionImpl AS c WHERE c.guid = ?1

named-query.name: CONDITION_BY_NAME
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM ConditionalExpressionImpl AS c WHERE c.name = ?1 AND c.named = true

named-query.name: CONDITION_ALL
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM ConditionalExpressionImpl AS c

named-query.name: CONDITION_ALL_BY_TAG_DICTIONARY
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM ConditionalExpressionImpl AS c WHERE c.tagDictionaryGuid = ?1

named-query.name: CONDITION_ALL_NAMED
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM ConditionalExpressionImpl AS c WHERE c.named = true

named-query.name: CONDITION_ALL_NAMED_BY_TAG_DICTIONARY
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM ConditionalExpressionImpl AS c WHERE c.tagDictionaryGuid = ?1 AND c.named = true

named-query.name: CONDITION_NAMED_BY_NAME_DICT_TAG
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM ConditionalExpressionImpl AS c WHERE (?1 IS NULL OR c.name LIKE ?1) AND (?2 IS NULL OR c.tagDictionaryGuid = ?2) AND (?3 IS NULL OR c.conditionString LIKE ?3) AND c.named = true ORDER BY c.name

named-query.name: CONDITION_NAMED_BY_NAME_DICT_TAG_SELLINGCONTEXT
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT c FROM ConditionalExpressionImpl AS c, SellingContextImpl AS sc, IN (sc.conditions) scc WHERE (?1 IS NULL OR c.name LIKE ?1) AND (?2 IS NULL OR c.tagDictionaryGuid = ?2) AND (?3 IS NULL OR c.conditionString LIKE ?3 ) AND (?4 IS NULL OR (c.guid = scc.guid AND sc.guid = ?4)) AND c.named = true ORDER BY c.name

named-query.name: CONDITIONAL_EXPRESSION_NAME_BY_GUID
named-query.query: SELECT c.name FROM ConditionalExpressionImpl AS c WHERE c.guid = ?1

named-query.name: TAG_OPERATOR_BY_GUID
named-query.query: SELECT t FROM TagOperatorImpl AS t WHERE t.guid = ?1

named-query.name: TAG_OPERATOR_ALL
named-query.query: SELECT t FROM TagOperatorImpl AS t

named-query.name: TAG_VALUE_TYPE_BY_GUID
named-query.query: SELECT t FROM TagValueTypeImpl AS t WHERE t.guid = ?1

named-query.name: TAG_VALUE_TYPE_ALL
named-query.query: SELECT t FROM TagValueTypeImpl AS t

named-query.name: UNIQUE_TAG_DEFINITION_GUIDS_BY_TAG_DICTIONARY_GUIDS
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT tagDefs.guid FROM TagDictionaryImpl AS tagDict INNER JOIN tagDict.tagDefinitions AS tagDefs WHERE tagDict.guid IN (:list)
